title: Senior Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Lead cybersecurity initiatives including threat detection, incident response, and security architecture design. Manage enterprise security tools and conduct regular security assessments.
achievements: Reduced security incidents by 40% through proactive threat hunting
Implemented zero-trust architecture for 500+ employee organization
Led incident response team during critical security breaches

title: System Administrator
description: Managed hybrid cloud infrastructure supporting 200+ servers across AWS and on-premises environments. Automated deployment processes and maintained 99.9% uptime.
achievements: Automated 80% of routine maintenance tasks using Ansible
Migrated legacy systems to cloud infrastructure with zero downtime
Established disaster recovery procedures reducing RTO by 60%

title: Junior IT Specialist
description: Provided technical support and maintained IT infrastructure for growing startup. Gained experience in network administration, user support, and system troubleshooting.
achievements: Implemented help desk ticketing system improving response time by 50%
Set up monitoring systems for network and server health
Trained 50+ employees on security best practices
